entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 10:36 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 10:36 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
